discussion.author: erikmd
discussion.comment: Closing/reopening the PR to restart the CI now that https://github.com/coq/opam-coq-archive/pull/1869 has been merged.

discussion.author: erikmd
discussion.comment:
FYI @CohenCyril now that's fine for the (coq-8.12, multinomials) job with the Docker build:
https://gitlab.com/math-comp/math-comp/-/pipelines/390538250

But I'm not sure what happens for the Nix jobs.

discussion.author: erikmd
discussion.comment:
> But I'm not sure what happens for the Nix jobs.

In particular for the coqeal failure… Anyway I guess that's orthogonal to this PR? (which is only an opam-related bugfix PR)

discussion.author: CohenCyril
discussion.comment:
> In particular for the coqeal failure… Anyway I guess that's orthogonal to this PR? (which is only an opam-related bugfix PR)

Yes it must be orthogonal in terms of fix, but the problem is related.
The thing is I do not understand how native vs non-native computation is enabled & propagated...

commits.author: erikmd
commits.message:
